fields.label: Hide Title
fields.name: hide_title
fields.instructions: Apply "hidden" class to page-header area to hide the title.

fields.label: Hide Content
fields.name: hide_content
fields.instructions: Used to disable the primary content area ( the_content ) on the page. This will, however, still generate metadata and excerpt content. If this options is enabled, it is recommended that you still create a brief summary of the page content in the primary content area for SEO/og-meta purposes.

sub_fields.label: Condensed Width
sub_fields.name: condensed_width
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to make additional content width smaller on desktop displays. Makes for better content flow and easier reading.

sub_fields.label: Condensed Width
sub_fields.name: condensed_width
sub_fields.instructions: Full Width spans the entire content area. Condensed Width squeezes this content into an easier to read area. This effects the Blocks Description area only and not the blocks following.

sub_fields.label: Block Media Audio
sub_fields.name: block_media_audio
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an audio file (mp3 for browser compatibility).

sub_fields.label: Invert Text Color
sub_fields.name: block_invert_text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to invert text color for easier reading on dark backgrounds/images.

sub_fields.label: Blocks Link?
sub_fields.name: blocks_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to display a link under out blocks

sub_fields.label: Condensed Width
sub_fields.name: condensed_width
sub_fields.message: Enable to constrain max column widths. Disable to flow columns across width of page.

sub_fields.label: Posts Per Page
sub_fields.name: posts_per_page
sub_fields.instructions: Number of posts to display. -1 shows all available posts.

choices.title: Order by title.
choices.ID: Order by post id. Note the captialization.
choices.author: Order by author.

sub_fields.label: Slider Width
sub_fields.name: slider_width
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, slider will span the full width of the page.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Basic title injection element. Much cleaner than trying to use the "Addition Content" element, just to add a title above another element.

sub_fields.label: Wrap Instructions
sub_fields.message: Allows you to wrap multiple elements in a single background wrapper. Useful for grouping similar sections or for creating the same background type over multiple areas. Ensure that you close the wrapped content with a "Closer Wrapper" element. Failing to do so may cause serious page rendering issues.

sub_fields.label: Enable Jumbotron
sub_fields.name: enable_jumbotron
sub_fields.message: Enable jumbotron to scale element based on screen height as opposed to adding padding around the content of the element.

sub_fields.label: Jumbotron Scale
sub_fields.name: jumbotron_scale
sub_fields.instructions: Height of background in relation to screen height. Defaults to 100%.

sub_fields.label: Background Fixed
sub_fields.name: background_fixed
sub_fields.message: When enabled, the background image will not scroll with the content and will remain fixed to the screen.

sub_fields.label: Background Cover
sub_fields.name: background_cover
sub_fields.message: When enabled the background image will scale to the containers max width or height.

sub_fields.label: Background Video
sub_fields.name: background_video
sub_fields.instructions:
Youtube Video ID. ex: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=
fIlJyZEbrzo

sub_fields.label: Opacity Amount
sub_fields.name: opacity_amount
sub_fields.instructions: Value ranges from 01 to 99. The higher the number, the more opaque the color overlay.

sub_fields.label: Down Arrow
sub_fields.name: down_arrow
sub_fields.message: When enabled, displays a "Down Arrow" at the bottom of the element prompting users to continue to scroll.

sub_fields.label: Close Wrapper Instructions
sub_fields.message: Only to be used AFTER including the Element Wrapper element. Creates closing markup and prevents rendering errors.
